docs.snippet: Kevin Durant had 36 points to offset Tony Parker’s season-high 37, and the Oklahoma City Thunder survived a testy 111-105 victory over the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant had 36 points to offset Tony Parker’s season-high 37, and the Oklahoma City Thunder survived a testy 111-105 victory over the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday night.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Oklahoma City Thunder beat San Antonio Spurs, 111-105, reclaiming top record in the West; other basketball news noted.

headline.main: Thunder Beat Spurs to Reclaim Top Record in the West
headline.print_headline: Thunder Top Spurs to Reclaim Top Record in the West

docs.snippet: Arizona State University announced Thursday that it is severing ties with a fraternity after the chapter hosted a distasteful party in commemoration of Martin Luther King Jr. Day, replete with racist stereotypes and offensive costumes....

docs.snippet: Online images of students prompted anger and calls for disciplinary action at Arizona State University....
docs.lead_paragraph: Online images of students prompted anger and calls for disciplinary action at Arizona State University.
docs.abstract: Arizona State University is investigating accusations that members of fraternity Tau Kappa Epsilon gave a party to commemorate Martin Luther King's Birthday at which nonblack students mocked blacks by donning loose basketball jerseys, flashing gang signs and drinking from hollowed-out watermelons.

headline.main: Arizona Fraternity Party Stirs Concerns of Racism
headline.print_headline: Arizona Fraternity Party Stirs Concerns of Racism
